career: Rate the importance of career success in the next 5 years to you. (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
Rate your desire to pursue your dream job regardless of pay. (1 being low desire, 10 being high desire)
How do you typically handle not achieving something despite hard work? (1 being easily discouraged, 10 being resilient)
How vital is financial stability in your life? (1 being not vital, 10 being extremely vital)
To what extent would you relocate for an ideal job opportunity? (1 being not willing, 10 being very willing)
How important is it for your partner to support your career choices? (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
Rate your willingness to compromise on your career for your relationship. (1 being not willing, 10 being very willing)
How essential is it for you and your partner to have similar career goals? (1 being not essential, 10 being very essential)
How do you feel about a partner who is more successful in their career? (1 being uncomfortable, 10 being comfortable and supportive)
Rate the importance of having a work-life balance. (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
How do you view the role of professional development in a relationship? (1 being not a priority, 10 being a top priority)
To what extent are you willing to make career sacrifices to support your partner's career? (1 being not willing, 10 being very willing)
How important is it for you that your partner understands your work-related stress? (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
Rate your preference for a partner who is equally ambitious in their career. (1 being not preferred, 10 being highly preferred)
How do you feel about your partner taking a career break for family or personal reasons? (1 being uncomfortable, 10 being supportive)
love: How open are you to having a relationship with someone of different beliefs? (1 being not open at all, 10 being very open)
Do you prefer exclusive dating (1) or dating multiple people (10)?
Would you marry for love, regardless of the person's status? (1 being not at all, 10 being absolutely)
Do you believe that confessions strengthen relationships? (1 being not at all, 10 being strongly)
How much do cultural differences matter to you in a relationship? (1 being not at all, 10 being a great deal)
Would you relocate for a significant other? (1 being not willing, 10 being very willing)
How important is physical affection in a relationship to you? (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
How much do you value long-term commitments in relationships? (1 being not at all, 10 being highly)
To what extent are shared hobbies and interests important in your relationships? (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
How essential is communication in resolving conflicts for you? (1 being not essential, 10 being very essential)
Rate the importance of your partner's social status for you. (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
How much do you believe in love at first sight? (1 being not at all, 10 being strongly)
To what degree do you consider fidelity as fundamental in a relationship? (1 being not fundamental, 10 being absolutely fundamental)
How willing are you to compromise in a relationship? (1 being not willing, 10 being very willing)
Rate the importance of having similar life goals with your partner. (1 being not important, 10 being very important)
feelings: Rate how significantly your relationship with your parents has influenced your life. none (1) everything (10)
How much do you agree with your friends' description of you? none (1) everything (10)
Do you tend to follow your heart more (1) or your head (10)?
Are you more inclined to hold grudges (1) or forgive easily (10)?
How deeply do you regret certain aspects of your life? none (1) everything (10)

To what extent do you consider yourself empathetic? (1 being not empathetic, 10 being highly empathetic)
How often do you feel overwhelmed by your emotions? (1 being rarely, 10 being frequently)

How much do certain quotes resonate with you personally? (1 being not at all, 10 being deeply)
